long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a stylesheet to every website you visit. The stylesheet is configured to change images into Borke and make some changes to background colours and text colours. This extension is great if you feel like there is not enough Borke on the internet!

Update changelog:
V0.1.2:
- Added extreme mode.
- The Borke image is saved locally which makes the extension faster.

V0.1.3:
- Borify does not turn on automatically on a restart anymore.

V0.1.4:
- Removed some unnecessary console logging.
- Updated URL for installed page.
